concept.title: 519.306 Protesting a firmâ€™s status as a HUBZone small business concern.

conbody.p: If SBA determines that an offeror is not a HUBZone small business concern, and there is evidence that the offeror knowingly misrepresented itself as such, contracting activities must refer the matter to the Inspector General and should also refer the matter to the Suspension and Debarment Official.
